original_text:
For he has delivered me from every trouble,
    and my eye has looked in triumph on my enemies.
korean_text: 참으로 주께서는 모든 환난에서 나를 건지시고 내 원수가 보응 받는 것을 내 눈이 똑똑히 보게 하셨나이다

sentences.original_text: For he has delivered me from every trouble
and my eye has looked in triumph on my enemies.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 내 눈은 승리하여 내 원수들을 바라보았습니다
